title: British rail workers: share your views on the train strikes
description:
We would like to hear from staff about their views on the walkouts next week

  • Tell us: how are you travelling during the rail strikes?

The biggest national rail strikes in 30 years are due to take place on Monday evening. More than 40,000 staff from Network rail and 13 train operators are expected to take part in walkouts on 21, 23 and 25 June. A special timetable will be in operation from 20 to 26 June.

We would like to hear from rail industry workers about their views on the strikes. Are you planning to take part in the walkouts? Why do you believe this is a necessary action to take?
